data.news_body: In terms of Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of Schedule III to the SEBI Listing Regulations, we hereby submit a  copy of  Investors'' presentation on un-audited financial results ( both standalone and consolidated) of the 2nd quarter and half year ended September 30, 2024  of the financial year 2024-25, to be discussed during investor call scheduled to be held on Thursday, November 14, 2024 at 11:30 a.m. (IST).

data.caption: Submission Of Unaudited Financial Results For The 2Nd Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30, 2024
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held today on Wednesday September 13, 2024 has considered and approved the unaudited financial results of the Company for the 2nd quarter and half year ended September 30, 2024 of the FY 2024-25, on both standalone and consolidated basis.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: In terms of Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of Schedule III to the SEBI Listing Regulations, we hereby submit ''Transcript'' of the Analyst/Investors'' Conference Call held on August 6, 2024 on the unaudited financial results of the Company for the 1st Quarter ended June 30, 2024 of the financial year 2024-25, on standalone and consolidated basis.

data.news_body: In terms of Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of Schedule III and 46 (2)(oa) of the SEBI Listing Regulations, the audio recording of the Investors''/Analyst conference call held on today August 6, 2024, is hosted on Company''s website i.e. https://www.exicom.in/investors#announcement
